title: My pixel device turned off.
content:
One day my pixel was freezed and it was unresponsive.I search the issue in google repair center and booked a service ticket that they will come in 2days and will receive the phone in 2 weeks.I believed the google security and send my phone to them.After their diagnosis I got an email,that my pixel phone was severely damaged,display broken,motherboard damaged,and it was done by water damage. I want to know about my device how it was damaged? I didn't hope it from Google. Why you torturing us?I have no phone till now,I was writing it in my brother's phone.What i had done to you,Why b2x??
My service ticketNo.GL0082371
I tried to contact b2x but they are not responding,and it not answering. I wrote so many emails but they didn't replying me.
What kind of service are you doing Google? Why you cheated me to send the device with Google security?
I have no another way that why I am writing this.
Please reply me and solve the problems.
I requesting to the concerned authorities to check the issue.
Please help me......................
